data.quote: True Scouts are the best friends of animals, for from living in the woods and wilds, and practising observation and tracking, they get to know more than other people about the ways and habits of birds and animals, and therefore they understand them and are more in sympathy with them.

data.quote: If you look at the history of technology over a couple hundred years, it's all about time compression and making the globe smaller. It's had positive effects, all the ones that we know. data.quote: I presume that nobody will deny the positive aspects of the North American cultural world. These are well known to all. data.quote: I never appreciated 'positive heroes' in literature. They are almost always cliches, copies of copies, until the model is exhausted. data.quote: About the most exciting thing a baby can do is burp - I've spent hours of my life holding a baby on my shoulder and patting its back, trying to loosen up a burp. data.quote: I have my team. Like if you see everyone around me - I have my hair and makeup girl, my assistant. They're very calm, they're all about positive energy. There're no drama queens.
